title: Corporate & Commercial Law
description: Comprehensive legal services for businesses including company formation, compliance, mergers & acquisitions, and corporate governance.
details: Expert guidance on corporate structuring, regulatory compliance, joint ventures, and commercial transactions. We help businesses navigate complex legal landscapes with confidence.

title: Civil Litigation
description: Strategic representation in civil disputes, contract breaches, property disputes, and commercial litigation matters.
details: Experienced advocacy in courts and tribunals with a track record of successful resolutions. We approach each case with thorough preparation and strategic thinking.

title: Contract Drafting & Review
description: Meticulous contract preparation, review, and negotiation to protect your interests and minimize legal risks.
details: From simple agreements to complex commercial contracts, we ensure every clause serves your best interests while maintaining enforceability.

title: Property & Real Estate
description: Complete real estate legal services including property transactions, title verification, and real estate disputes.
details: Comprehensive support for buying, selling, leasing, and developing real estate. We handle due diligence, documentation, and dispute resolution.

title: Family Law & Mediation
description: Sensitive handling of family matters including divorce, custody, matrimonial disputes, and alternative dispute resolution.
details: Compassionate legal support during difficult family transitions. We prioritize amicable resolutions through mediation and negotiation.

title: Consumer Protection
description: Advocacy for consumer rights, product liability claims, and protection against unfair trade practices.
details: Strong representation for consumers facing unfair business practices, defective products, or service violations. We fight for your rights and fair compensation.
